1901050.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901050
In-book reference  : Book 13, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 13, Hadith 001
1901050.text: Anas said: “Ihe pommel of the sword of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) was made of silver.”

1901060.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901060
In-book reference  : Book 13, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 13, Hadith 002
1901060.text: Sa'id ibn Abi’l-Hasan al-Basri said: “The pommel of the sword of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) was made of silver."

1901070.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901070
In-book reference  : Book 13, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 13, Hadith 003
1901070.text: Hud (i.e. Ibn 'Abdi’llah ibn Sa'd) reports that his grandfather said: "Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) entered Mecca on the Day of Victory with gold and silver on his sword. An inquirer said: 'I asked him about the silver', and he said: ‘The pommel of the sword was silver'.”

1901080.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901080
In-book reference  : Book 13, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 13, Hadith 004
1901080.text: Ibn Sirin said: "I made my sword in the shape of the sword of Samura ibn Jundub." Samura also claimed that he made his sword in the shape of the sword of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace), for he was a Hanafi.
